Detailed Description

Generates the view for printing.

Does not print background colors. Date and amounts are fixed-size, while label is given 2/5 of rest, and description 3/5.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) initWithOwner: (ZXDocument *)  owner  

Initialize the print view with given document.

Given document is normally the currently opened frontmost document

Parameters:
owner Owner of the print view, i.e. document to be printed.
Returns:
New print view

- (NSRect) rectForTransaction: (int)  i   [implementation]

Calculates the required rect for given transaction.

Given document is normally the currently opened frontmost document

Parameters:
i Position ID of the transaction (e.g. 3rd, 4th, etc).
Returns:
A rectangle corresponding to the required view.

- (int) transactionsPerPage   [implementation]

Calculates the number of transactions per page.

This calculation is based of hard-coded value of the vertical height for each transaction
